website_summaries.verdict: A handheld pair of pliers that cut diagonally and are suitable for the iron worker.
pros: Used for cutting softer tie wire
Users agree it cuts wire successfully
cons: This tool is starkly different from a motorized rebar cutter
Buyers should make sure they purchase according to their needs

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time buying klein dikes and the jaws dont line up and it sucks at cutting. was hoping that this second purchase would be better than my first purchase but i was wrong. complete waste of money. i do not recommend anyone purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: BayRty

customer_reviews.title: Best Dikes Available
customer_reviews.text: I'm a carpenter and all around construction worker. I use it mainly for pulling and cutting nails. Cuts wire great just make sure it's not hot, they don't work well after that.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.H.III

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Wire Cutters That Work
customer_reviews.text: After wasting countless dollars on cheap, ineffective wire cutters, I invested in these. I use them primarily in cutting through heavy wire artificial floral stems and they work perfectly and have saved my hands and my sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I cut a tap con withthis and there are no dents or chips. If you get a bum One its worth a return and rebuy because its the best diagonal cutter out there. Wide mouth, big leverage, strong cutting blades. The price is crazy. I got mine for like 21. These should be priced at 40 at least. I bought three
customer_reviews.author: nick_hawaii

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time I tried to get a knockout out of a 4 square special.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters for everything
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cutter for the last 8 years or so they last me for a long time . I use them to cut chainlink fence wire when I'm installing they work great
customer_reviews.author: Eltronkko

customer_reviews.title: Klein hand tools are great
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily at work. All of my Klein hand tools are great. I like the extra leverage with the longer handles.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Best side cutters.
customer_reviews.text: The extra 2 inches of leverage makes these cutters easier for almost anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: These looked great for cutting stainless pins on industrial washer mat. From new the hinge was binding and took extra steps to open. No amount of lube or use loosened 'em. Cutter held up only a few dozen uses before chipped and dull. Some of my cheap Chinese side-cutters held up longer and were easier to use. I bought these for two reasons: the longer handles for leverage and Klein's reputation. Ergonomics earned some stars, but otherwise cheaper Chinese stuff were a better deal
customer_reviews.author: middleager

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I work as a residential electrician
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I work as a residential electrician, and I also install traffic lights and roadway lighting as well. These wire cutters have handled all kinds of challenges I have thrown at them. Truly a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Stohldrier

customer_reviews.title: BUY KLEIN
customer_reviews.text: Buy klein, cant beat the performance, they work great and they stay sharp. I cut nails, staples and wire all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AmaIng snips
customer_reviews.text: One of the best quality cutters/snips you can buy, I own these diagonal cutters and a pair of their linesman’s and they are both amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the best.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a carpenter. I bought two of these pliers because they lowered the price in half and I consider Klein to be the best, they are sharp and fit good in my hand. I also like the longer handles because I get more leverage to cut thicker wire and nails like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Coria

customer_reviews.title: Well made tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I use it every day. I've had an older set for almost 12 years. I bought this one as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: If there's one thing Klein does well it's their hand tools. This one is no exception. Cuts right through flex duct wire. Love these cutters!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sale

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: The extra length and kick on the end definitely gives more leverage than regular cutters. I can cut 10-3 with one hand with these suckers if I've had my Wheaties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good leverge
customer_reviews.text: Bought for extra handle length for extra leverage. Much easier to do my job
customer_reviews.author: Roger R

customer_reviews.title: best pliers
customer_reviews.text: Klein makes the best plairs on the market. I am a iron worker and I use these every day
customer_reviews.author: gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of concrete form work and you end up using these everyday and having the tie off ring is awesome. But where I live it’s wet most of the year and these have been through a lot of mud and still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great cutter, well worth the money. But then again I’ve only had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: RodwinV9

customer_reviews.title: Klein Cutters
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Klein cutters I have owned...They are a great tool that last forever!
customer_reviews.author: TOMMY G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Way better then I expected! These are longer then my old ones (which is good) better leverage when cutting wire!.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Salazar

customer_reviews.title: All working together to make a good cutter.
customer_reviews.text: These are Klein, what else need be said. Designed for the professional. The cutting edges meet together, the effort required to cut is reduced by design, and the grip handle is long. All working together to make a good cutter.
customer_reviews.author: recluse

customer_reviews.title: Cuts smothly and effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: If this rating had a 6, I would have given it. The pivot is closer to the cut area so it gives more leverage, sharper point to get into tight places, hook on the handle so it doesn't slip out of sweety hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair because the first were destroyed because of something I did not the pliers. I would of given this item 5 stars but they weren't very lose when I first got them and even after I put WD-40 on them it didn't really help. After a day of useing them they loosened up but the handle still doesn't fall freely like a good broken pair of diagonal pliers should. In a matter of time they should though I believe. I've used this pair and the 8 inch without the angled nose and I prefer these. Much more ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Everybody will try to steal these!!
customer_reviews.text: First off you can never go wrong with Klein tools. The long handles makes for quick work of just about anything you want to cut. I’ve left with out my tin snips before and to my surprise I was able to get by with these.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Klein Tools are the best!
customer_reviews.text: As a retired Electrical Engineer/Electrician I can personally attest to the durability of these cutters. They easily cut with 2/3's to 1/2 of the effort required by other pliers and are sharp enough to cut a single thread. I have used many tools and Kleins have always outlasted any other brand. I cannot recommend them high enough!
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Tatyana Hetzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutters, but Size is Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: These are really handy and the blade stays sharp, but the picture makes you think they are a little bigger than what they are. Be sure to ready the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shredder

customer_reviews.title: PRICE AND QUALITY... ITS JUST THAT SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: Lost this tool as well as some needle nose. Was looking for good quality at a fair price and ended up getting a new pair of these. And made in the U.S. I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Klein tools are a go to tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love Klein tools. Tough and durable. Made in the USA, you should have at least one pair in your tool box. I use them for many different jobs.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the Best! Very sharp, tough and the long handles are great. I forgot to mention durable, i have cut 16 dup nails with then. only reason I had to get a new pair some one had sticky hands!!!

customer_reviews.title: My new best diagonal cutters in the tool box

customer_reviews.title: Klein always the smart choice
customer_reviews.text: This tool is an exceptional wire cutter for copper or steel. However to list it's use as a rebar cutter or bender is stretching it.

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not made in china, or sold at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I break forms and cages within pile caps, there is no better tool for what I gotta do. Every single guy on the rebar crew has a pair of these exact model, for very good reason.

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bent angle diagonal pliers for decades. They are the best for removing Staples .

customer_reviews.title: Prefer channel lock
customer_reviews.text: I've been using channel lock diagonal cutters for years. I had heard about Klein and thought I'd like to give them a try. As mentioned by other reviewers, these are very tight. I've used them for about six hours and they are beginning to loosen up. I cut a lot of 3/32 steel rod and 8 gauge copper wire in my work. I compared their cutting action with a pair of 4-year-old channel lock cutters. I really couldn't tell the difference. Now, I may have got a bad pair, that's possible, but for now, I will stick with channel lock cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Klein quality

The leverage and angle on it is ideal for cutting wire in the tightest places and most awkward positions. This is a must have tool in his trade.

product_meta.title: Klein Tools D248-9ST Pliers, Ironworker's Diagonal Cutting Pliers with High Leverage Design Works as Rebar Cutter and Rebar Bender, 9-Inch
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardPopular with Ironworkers, these diagonal-cutting pliers were designed for rebar work. The 13 degree angled head makes it easier to work in confined spaces while the hooked handle improves the grip and reduces slippage. The high-leverage design has 36-Percent more cutting power. A hot-riveted joint ensures smooth action and no wobble in the handle. This pair will be your go-to tool when working with soft annealed rebar tie wire. 9-Inch pliers are ideal to cut the rebar tie wire. induction hardened cutting knives for long life. Pliers have plastic-dipped handles for comfort. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers. The Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers has an angled head design for easy work in confined spaces. The Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers has a hooked handle for improved grip. The Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers features the High-leverage design where the rivet is closer to the cutting edge for 36-Percent greater cutting power than other pliers designs. The Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers is custom US-made tool steel. The Klein D248-9ST 9-Inch High-Leverage Diagonal-Cutting Pliers has induction hardened cutting knives for long life, a hot-riveted joint that ensures smooth action and no handle wobble, short jaws and beveled cutting edges permit close cutting of wire, and plastic-dipped handles for comfort and ease of identification.
feature_bullets: For soft annealed rebar tie wire
Short jaws and beveled cutting edges permit close cutting of wire
Induction-hardened cutting knives for long life
Plastic-dipped handles for comfort and ease of identification

specifications.Warranty Description: Klein products manufactured and sold for commercial or industrial uses, are warranted to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for the normal life of the product, with the exception of: I. Cordomatic products
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars983 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
